title: 神漫画
ThirdReadModeXpath: function getQZImgList(){           var chapterId = html.match(/chapterId:\"(.*?)\"/)[1];          var comicId = html.match(/comicId:\"(.*?)\"/)[1];               var jsonurl = "http://getcomicinfo-globalapi.yyhao.com/app_api/v5/getcomicinfo_body/?comic_id="+comicId;          Jlogd(chapterId);          Jlogd(comicId);          Jlogd(jsonurl);           var result = aJax(jsonurl);               var chapters = JSON.parse(result).comic_chapter;          var chapter;          for (var i=0; i<chapters.length; i++) {                  if (String(chapters[i].chapter_id) == chapterId) {                          chapter = chapters[i];                          break;                  }          }           var path = chapter.rule;          var host = "https://mhpic.manhualang.com" + path.split("$$")[0];           var ext = path.split("$$")[1];            var pn = parseInt(chapter.end_num-chapter.start_num+1);            var piclist = new Array(pn);            for (var i = 0; i < pn; i++) {                     piclist[i] = host+(i+1)+ext+"-kmh.high.webp";              }               return piclist;          }
